name: Telescopic Lift
description: A lift that folds up from below when activated.

fields.name: Direction
fields.description: The third switch variable necessary to activate the actor.

fields.name: Height
fields.description: Defines the height of the lift.

fields.name: Width
fields.description: Defines the width of the lift.

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The local variable that activates the lift.
